data.text: @JimJustice_WV @CADCA We, the Iranian people, declare that over 40,000 of us have been killed by the regime. We urge the U.S. and the world: don’t just focus on nuclear issues. Stand with us for our basic freedoms. We need your support.

@JimJustice_WV @CADCA Jim sir,
Can we please get the SAVE ACT on the floor. 80+% of American citizens approve of it!

@JimJustice_WV @CADCA @JimJustice_WV Rural schools in WV are being closed at a rapid speed! Kids on the bus for well over an hour, one way! Please reach out to @wvgovernor and work together to pass the Save Rural Schools Act! 🙏🏻🙏🏻
